summary: Bolton, trying to get the ranchers to leave, has his outlaw gang ambush all incoming supply wagons. Curly Thompson, out to stop them, gets framed for murder and put in jail.
cast: Bob Steele|Syd Saylor|I. Stanford Jolley|Lorraine Miller|Charles King|John Cason|Budd Buster|Kermit Maynard|Frank Ellis|Ed Cassidy|Roy Brent|Al Ferguson|Henry Hall|Ray Jones|Lew Morphy|Wally West
keywords: b movie|b western|poverty row film|low budget film|double feature film
director: Director: Harry L. Fraser (as Harry Fraser)
title: Ambush Trail
